mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GUESTBOOK ORDER BY IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUESTBOOK (IDX, NAME, SUBJECT, CONTENT, EMAIL, PWD, REGDATE) VALUES (GUESTBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name }, #{subject }, #{content }, #{email }, #{pwd }, SYSDATE - 3)
mapper.update: UPDATE GUESTBOOK SET NAME = #{name }, SUBJECT = #{subject }, EMAIL = #{email }, CONTENT = #{content }, REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
